Name: Highball (Generic Name)
Ingredients: 60 ml Brandy, whisk(e)y, gin, rum etc.
Top up with Ginger ale, soda, tonic water or other carbonated mixer
Instructions: POUR spirit into ice-filled glass and TOP with a carbonated soft drink (ginger ale, soda or tonic water).
Review: Simple, but simplicity can be beautiful.
History: Information on Highball cocktails , their history and tips on the perfect serve can be found on our page.
Nutrition: One serving of Highball (Generic Name) contains 125 calories
Garnish: Orange, lime or lemon slice (as appropriate to the spirit or the carbonate)
